title: US futures edge higher and gold hits another record as markets swoon over Greenland dispute
full_text: US futures edge higher and gold hits another record as markets swoon over Greenland dispute. Asian shares mostly extended their losses on Wednesday and gold prices hit a record high as concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff threats on....
